005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.metaschema.binding;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.adapter.TokenAdapter;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.adapter.UriAdapter;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.adapter.UriReferenceAdapter;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IBoundObject;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IMetaschemaData;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.JsonGroupAsBehavior;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.IConstraint;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.BoundAssembly;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.BoundField;
018import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.BoundFlag;
019import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.Expect;
020import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.GroupAs;
021import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.IsUnique;
022import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.KeyField;
023import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.Let;
024import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.MetaschemaAssembly;
025import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.ValueConstraints;
026
027import org.apache.commons.lang3.builder.ReflectionToStringBuilder;
028import org.apache.commons.lang3.builder.ToStringStyle;
029
030import java.net.URI;
031import java.util.LinkedList;
032import java.util.List;
033
034/**
035 * Defines constraint rules to be applied to an existing set of Metaschema
036 * module-based models.
037 */
038@SuppressWarnings({
039    "PMD.DataClass",
040    "PMD.FieldNamingConventions",
041})
042@MetaschemaAssembly(
043    formalName = "External Module Constraints",
044    description = "Defines constraint rules to be applied to an existing set of Metaschema module-based models.",
045    name = "metaschema-meta-constraints",
046    moduleClass = MetaschemaModelModule.class,
047    rootName = "metaschema-meta-constraints",
048    valueConstraints = @ValueConstraints(lets = @Let(name = "deprecated-type-map",
049        target = "map { 'base64Binary':'base64','dateTime':'date-time','dateTime-with-timezone':'date-time-with-timezone','email':'email-address','nonNegativeInteger':'non-negative-integer','positiveInteger':'positive-integer' }"),
050        expect = @Expect(id = "metaschema-deprecated-types", formalName = "Avoid Deprecated Data Type Use",
051            description = "Ensure that the data type specified is not one of the legacy Metaschema data types which have been deprecated (i.e. base64Binary, dateTime, dateTime-with-timezone, email, nonNegativeInteger, positiveInteger).",
052            level = IConstraint.Level.WARNING, target = ".//matches/@datatype|.//(define-field|define-flag)/@as-type",
053            test = "not(.=('base64Binary','dateTime','dateTime-with-timezone','email','nonNegativeInteger','positiveInteger'))",
054            message = "Use of the type '{ . }' is deprecated. Use '{ $deprecated-type-map(.)}' instead.")),
055    modelConstraints = @gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.AssemblyConstraints(unique = {
056        @IsUnique(id = "meta-constraints-namespace-unique-entry", formalName = "Require Unique Namespace Entries",
057            description = "Ensures that all declared namespace entries are unique.", level = IConstraint.Level.ERROR,
058            target = "namespace-binding", keyFields = { @KeyField(target = "@prefix"), @KeyField(target = "@uri") }),
059        @IsUnique(id = "meta-constraints-namespace-unique-prefix",
060            formalName = "Require Unique Namespace Entry Prefixes",
061            description = "Ensures that all declared namespace entries have a unique prefix.",
062            level = IConstraint.Level.ERROR, target = "namespace-binding",
063            keyFields = @KeyField(target = "@prefix")) }))
064public class MetaschemaMetaConstraints implements IBoundObject {
065  private final IMetaschemaData __metaschemaData;
066
067  @BoundAssembly(
068      description = "Declares a set of Metaschema constraints from an out-of-line resource to import, supporting composition of constraint sets.",
069      useName = "import",
070      maxOccurs = -1,
071      groupAs = @GroupAs(name = "imports", inJson = JsonGroupAsBehavior.LIST))
072  private List<Import> _imports;
073
074  @BoundAssembly(
075      formalName = "Metapath Namespace Declaration",
076      description = "Assigns a Metapath namespace to a prefix for use in a Metapath expression in a lexical qualified name.",
077      useName = "namespace-binding",
078      maxOccurs = -1,
079      groupAs = @GroupAs(name = "namespace-bindings"))
080  private List<MetapathNamespace> _namespaceBindings;
081
082  @BoundAssembly(
083      useName = "definition-context")
084  private DefinitionContext _definitionContext;
085
086  @BoundAssembly(
087      useName = "context",
088      minOccurs = 1,
089      maxOccurs = -1,
090      groupAs = @GroupAs(name = "contexts", inJson = JsonGroupAsBehavior.LIST))
091  private List<MetapathContext> _contexts;
092
093  public MetaschemaMetaConstraints() {
094    this(null);
095  }
096
097  public MetaschemaMetaConstraints(IMetaschemaData data) {
098    this.__metaschemaData = data;
099  }
100
101  @Override
102  public IMetaschemaData getMetaschemaData() {
103    return __metaschemaData;
104  }
105
106  public List<Import> getImports() {
107    return _imports;
108  }
109
110  public void setImports(List<Import> value) {
111    _imports = value;
112  }
113
114  /**
115   * Add a new {@link Import} item to the underlying collection.
116   *
117   * @param item
118   *          the item to add
119   * @return {@code true}
120   */
121  public boolean addImport(Import item) {
122    Import value = ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(item, "item cannot be null");
123    if (_imports == null) {
124      _imports = new LinkedList<>();
125    }
126    return _imports.add(value);
127  }
128
129  /**
130   * Remove the first matching {@link Import} item from the underlying collection.
131   *
132   * @param item
133   *          the item to remove
134   * @return {@code true} if the item was removed or {@code false} otherwise
135   */
136  public boolean removeImport(Import item) {
137    Import value = ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(item, "item cannot be null");
138    return _imports != null && _imports.remove(value);
139  }
140
141  public List<MetapathNamespace> getNamespaceBindings() {
142    return _namespaceBindings;
143  }
144
145  public void setNamespaceBindings(List<MetapathNamespace> value) {
146    _namespaceBindings = value;
147  }
148
149  /**
150   * Add a new {@link MetapathNamespace} item to the underlying collection.
151   *
152   * @param item
153   *          the item to add
154   * @return {@code true}
155   */
156  public boolean addNamespaceBinding(MetapathNamespace item) {
157    MetapathNamespace value = ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(item, "item cannot be null");
158    if (_namespaceBindings == null) {
159      _namespaceBindings = new LinkedList<>();
160    }
161    return _namespaceBindings.add(value);
162  }
163
164  /**
165   * Remove the first matching {@link MetapathNamespace} item from the underlying
166   * collection.
167   *
168   * @param item
169   *          the item to remove
170   * @return {@code true} if the item was removed or {@code false} otherwise
171   */
172  public boolean removeNamespaceBinding(MetapathNamespace item) {
173    MetapathNamespace value = ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(item, "item cannot be null");
174    return _namespaceBindings != null && _namespaceBindings.remove(value);
175  }
176
177  public DefinitionContext getDefinitionContext() {
178    return _definitionContext;
179  }
180
181  public void setDefinitionContext(DefinitionContext value) {
182    _definitionContext = value;
183  }
184
185  public List<MetapathContext> getContexts() {
186    return _contexts;
187  }
188
189  public void setContexts(List<MetapathContext> value) {
190    _contexts = value;
191  }
192
193  /**
194   * Add a new {@link MetapathContext} item to the underlying collection.
195   *
196   * @param item
197   *          the item to add
198   * @return {@code true}
199   */
200  public boolean addContext(MetapathContext item) {
201    MetapathContext value = ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(item, "item cannot be null");
202    if (_contexts == null) {
203      _contexts = new LinkedList<>();
204    }
205    return _contexts.add(value);
206  }
207
208  /**
209   * Remove the first matching {@link MetapathContext} item from the underlying
210   * collection.
211   *
212   * @param item
213   *          the item to remove
214   * @return {@code true} if the item was removed or {@code false} otherwise
215   */
216  public boolean removeContext(MetapathContext item) {
217    MetapathContext value = ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(item, "item cannot be null");
218    return _contexts != null && _contexts.remove(value);
219  }
220
221  @Override
222  public String toString() {
223    return new ReflectionToStringBuilder(this, ToStringStyle.MULTI_LINE_STYLE).toString();
224  }
225
226  /**
227   * Declares a set of Metaschema constraints from an out-of-line resource to
228   * import, supporting composition of constraint sets.
229   */
230  @MetaschemaAssembly(
231      description = "Declares a set of Metaschema constraints from an out-of-line resource to import, supporting composition of constraint sets.",
232      name = "import",
233      moduleClass = MetaschemaModelModule.class)
234  public static class Import implements IBoundObject {
235    private final IMetaschemaData __metaschemaData;
236
237    /**
238     * "A relative or absolute URI for retrieving an out-of-line Metaschema
239     * constraint definition."
240     */
241    @BoundFlag(
242        description = "A relative or absolute URI for retrieving an out-of-line Metaschema constraint definition.",
243        name = "href",
244        required = true,
245        typeAdapter = UriReferenceAdapter.class)
246    private URI _href;
247
248    public Import() {
249      this(null);
250    }
251
252    public Import(IMetaschemaData data) {
253      this.__metaschemaData = data;
254    }
255
256    @Override
257    public IMetaschemaData getMetaschemaData() {
258      return __metaschemaData;
259    }
260
261    public URI getHref() {
262      return _href;
263    }
264
265    public void setHref(URI value) {
266      _href = value;
267    }
268
269    @Override
270    public String toString() {
271      return new ReflectionToStringBuilder(this, ToStringStyle.MULTI_LINE_STYLE).toString();
272    }
273  }
274
275  @MetaschemaAssembly(
276      name = "definition-context",
277      moduleClass = MetaschemaModelModule.class)
278  public static class DefinitionContext implements IBoundObject {
279    private final IMetaschemaData __metaschemaData;
280
281    @BoundFlag(
282        name = "name",
283        required = true,
284        typeAdapter = TokenAdapter.class)
285    private String _name;
286
287    @BoundFlag(
288        name = "namespace",
289        required = true,
290        typeAdapter = UriAdapter.class)
291    private URI _namespace;
292
293    @BoundAssembly(
294        useName = "constraints",
295        minOccurs = 1)
296    private AssemblyConstraints _constraints;
297
298    @BoundField(
299        formalName = "Remarks",
300        description = "Any explanatory or helpful information to be provided about the remarks parent.",
301        useName = "remarks")
302    private Remarks _remarks;
303
304    public DefinitionContext() {
305      this(null);
306    }
307
308    public DefinitionContext(IMetaschemaData data) {
309      this.__metaschemaData = data;
310    }
311
312    @Override
313    public IMetaschemaData getMetaschemaData() {
314      return __metaschemaData;
315    }
316
317    public String getName() {
318      return _name;
319    }
320
321    public void setName(String value) {
322      _name = value;
323    }
324
325    public URI getNamespace() {
326      return _namespace;
327    }
328
329    public void setNamespace(URI value) {
330      _namespace = value;
331    }
332
333    public AssemblyConstraints getConstraints() {
334      return _constraints;
335    }
336
337    public void setConstraints(AssemblyConstraints value) {
338      _constraints = value;
339    }
340
341    public Remarks getRemarks() {
342      return _remarks;
343    }
344
345    public void setRemarks(Remarks value) {
346      _remarks = value;
347    }
348
349    @Override
350    public String toString() {
351      return new ReflectionToStringBuilder(this, ToStringStyle.MULTI_LINE_STYLE).toString();
352    }
353  }
354}
